About

I’m Dan. I live in Chicago, ride bikes, make things from fabric, put things on maps, and write code. I work for the Delta Institute in Chicago.

This space is part experiment, documentation, memory aid, and sounding board. Development is ongoing and you can follow along or submit an issue on GitHub.

Tech Specs

Because whether it’s computers, bicycles, craft beer or home appliances, everybody loves specs.

  • Built with Jekyll, hosted on GitHub Pages
  • Theme is based on Poole with lots of modifications
  • See my post here for more details

Want to talk?

You can get a hold of me via:

  • Twitter
  • GitHub
  • Email

If you’re looking for info on Maptime Chicago, try contacting me through one of the above channels or via one of Maptime Chicago’s more official channels:

  • @MaptimeCHI on Twitter
  • On the web at maptime.io/chicago, where you can also sign up for the mailing list
  • Email maptimechi@gmail.com

Thanks!
